title: Solving Systems of Equations in Word Problems
body: Melody wants to sell bags of mixed candy at her lemonade stand. She will mix chocolate pieces that cost $4.89 per bag with peanut butter pieces that cost $3.79 per bag to get a total of twenty-five bags of mixed candy. Melody wants the bags of mixed candy to cost her $4.23 a bag to make.
lesson: 5.5 Solve Mixture Applications with Systems of Equations
